metadata.title: CVE-2023-52856 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/bridge: lt8912b: Fix crash on bridge detach The lt8912b driver, in itsbridge detach function, calls drm_connector_unregister() anddrm_connector_cleanup(). drm_connector_unregister() should be called onlyfor connectors explicitly registered with drm_connector_register(), whichis not the case in lt8912b. The driver's drm_connector_funcs.destroy hookis set to drm_connector_cleanup(). Thus the driver should not call eitherdrm_connector_unregister() nor drm_connector_cleanup() in itslt8912_bridge_detach(), as they cause a crash on bridge detach: Unable tohandle kernel NULL pointer
